channel.title: SPIE 2024 on 张嘉铭
channel.description: Recent content in SPIE 2024 on 张嘉铭

item.title: SAMME: Segment Any Medical Model Extended
item.description: I’m excited to announce that our project SAMM has received many attentions from all over the world! Please reach out if you want to collaborate. SAMM allows users to directly leverage the powerful Segment Anything Model (SAM) to segment medical images (including CT, MR, Ultrasound, and more) in 3D Slicer.
